details.message: Successfully integrated Unity Muse and Retro Diffusion Pipeline toolchains for ROO#SUB_PLAN_20250518-170411_S005. MCP server updated with access methods, and LevelArchitectAgent and PixelForgeAgent updated to utilize them. Negotiation protocol classes also created as per design.
Analysis for ROO#SUB_183202_S001 complete. Report: [communication_architecture_design.md](.rooroo/tasks/ROO#SUB_183202_S001/artifacts/communication_architecture_design.md).
Task ROO#SUB_183202_S002: Modified mcp_server_core.py to expose Flask-based API endpoints as per communication architecture. Created README.md for server usage.

Task ROO#SUB_183202_S003: Developed C# Unity MCP client (MCP_Client.cs) and README.md. Client handles asynchronous communication with the Python MCP server, supports configurable server settings, and includes example usage. Artifacts are located in .rooroo/tasks/ROO#SUB_183202_S003/artifacts/.

details.message: Resolved circular import issues for ROO#DEBUG_IMPORTS_20250518-192953. MCPClient defined in mcp_server_core.py and DocumentationSentinelAgent import of MCPClient made dynamic.

Resolved circular import for ROO#DEBUG_DOCSENTINEL_IMPORT_20250518-194728 by extracting MCPClient to its own file. mcp_server_core.py and documentation_sentinel_agent.py were updated to use the new mcp_client.py.

details.message: Plan for AI Agent Ecosystem full project setup generated successfully.
Successfully created the core project directory structure and __init__.py files for ROO#SUB_182251_S001.
Completed task ROO#SUB_182251_S002: Relocated MCP files to src/mcp_server, updated imports, and created requirements.txt.
Task ROO#SUB_182251_S003: Agent files moved to src/agents/, imports updated, and src/agents/base_agent.py created.

Successfully relocated and refactored toolchain bridge files to src/toolchains/ for task ROO#SUB_182251_S004. Created base_toolchain_bridge.py, muse_bridge.py, retro_diffusion_bridge.py, and __init__.py. Internal imports updated. Imports of these new bridge modules in other project components may need to be updated separately.
Successfully implemented core logic for LevelArchitectAgent (ROO#SUB_182251_S005). handle_direct_request and _assemble_scene_in_unity_muse methods updated. execute method and imports reviewed.

Successfully implemented core logic for PixelForgeAgent in src/agents/pixel_forge.py (ROO#SUB_182251_S006). Implemented handle_direct_request and execute methods, ensuring interaction with RetroDiffusionToolchainBridge and conceptual GameDevState processing.

Successfully implemented core logic for DocumentationSentinelAgent (ROO#SUB_182251_S007). Implemented handle_direct_request and execute methods, and updated imports in src/agents/documentation_sentinel.py.

Implemented core logic for MuseToolchainBridge in src/toolchains/muse_bridge.py. Added generate_level_layout and get_asset_suggestions methods, updated command templates, refined mock API responses, uncommented 'requests' import, and updated __main__ test cases. Created requirements_update.txt for 'requests' library.

Implemented core logic for RetroDiffusionToolchainBridge in src/toolchains/retro_diffusion_bridge.py (ROO#SUB_182251_S009). Added generate_asset and upscale_asset methods with mock backends and TODOs for API integration. Imports are correct for current mock implementation.
Documentation for ROO#SUB_182251_S010 complete.

Task ROO#SUB_182251_S017: Developed basic test scripts for the MCP server's /execute_agent endpoint in tests/test_mcp_server.py using pytest and Flask's test client. Added pytest and httpx to requirements.txt. Tests include mocking agent calls and checking for various request scenarios (success, agent not found, invalid requests).

Task ROO#SUB_182251_S018: Successfully developed unit test script for DocumentationSentinelAgent at tests/agents/test_documentation_sentinel.py, covering core methods handle_direct_request and execute with mocked dependencies.

Sub-plan for Core MCP Server Infrastructure Setup created with 5 tasks.
Task ROO#SUB_20250520-020934_S001: Initialized MCP Server project structure, created placeholder Python files, and updated dependencies in requirements.txt. Report generated.

Successfully implemented core MCP Server API endpoints for ROO#SUB_20250520-020934_S002. Created Pydantic models, API routes, basic unit tests, and an implementation report. The server now has foundational endpoints for status, agent registration/discovery, event posting, and action/tool requests.

Task ROO#SUB_20250520-020934_S003: Initial LangGraph integration for MCP state management is complete. Key components including StateManager, ManagedTaskState model, API placeholders, and basic unit tests have been implemented. Report generated.
Successfully implemented PromptRegistry class, unit tests, and report for ROO#SUB_20250520-020934_S004.

Successfully created a 6-step plan for implementing the Level Architect agent.

Implemented core logic for LevelArchitectAgent (ROO#SUB_20250520-024601_S002) including process_task and helper methods with placeholders. Created implementation report.

Task ROO#SUB_20250520-024601_S003: LevelArchitectAgent successfully integrated with MCP server. Key flows for registration, task initiation (via StateManager), and event-based status reporting are implemented. Test script and documentation updated.
Completed development of LevelArchitectAgent prompt templates, integration, and behavior enforcement for ROO#SUB_20250520-024601_S004. Agent code updated, unit tests created, and report generated.
Completed unit test implementation for LevelArchitectAgent for task ROO#SUB_20250520-024601_S005. Tests cover core logic, prompt handling, and mocked MCP interactions. Report generated.
Documentation for ROO#SUB_20250520-024601_S006 complete.

Successfully implemented remaining core components and documentation for the Autonomous AI Agent Ecosystem (Task ROO#BIGBUILD_20250520-031504). All specified Python modules, documentation files, agent tests, and an E2E test scenario have been created with conceptual/placeholder logic.
